emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of not just suggesting code but generating entire applications based on high-level requirements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces the skill barrier in programming, potentially leading to an increase in software developers and innovation, but also raises concerns about job displacement in coding professions.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be driven by productivity gains, though initial resistance might come from developers protective of their craft.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace
emerging_technologies.description: A brain-computer interface that can integrate with the human brain, enhancing cognitive abilities and allowing direct communication with digital devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize how we interact with technology, but ethical concerns about privacy, autonomy, and consent will be significant.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial costs, need for regulatory approval, and public acceptance will dictate the pace of adoption.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain for Autonomous Vehicle Networks
emerging_technologies.description: Using blockchain to manage and secure data exchanges between autonomous vehicles for better coordination and security.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increases trust and efficiency in vehicle-to-vehicle communication, potentially reducing accidents and improving traffic flow.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will depend on the integration of blockchain into existing automotive systems and the standardization of protocols.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography
emerging_technologies.description: New cryptographic methods designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ensures long-term security of data in the face of quantum computing threats, critical for government, finance, and all data-sensitive industries.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be driven by the need for security but might be slow due to the need for replacing existing cryptographic systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Space Resource Mining
emerging_technologies.description: Technology to mine resources from asteroids or other celestial bodies, starting with water and metals.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to new economic models, space colonization efforts, and potentially reduce resource scarcity on Earth.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption hinges on technological breakthroughs in space travel, robotics, and international space law.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that work alongside human developers, offering real-time coding suggestions, debugging, and even testing.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech industries, significantly enhancing productivity and reducing development cycles.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Grids with Renewable Integration
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced electrical grids that integrate renewable energy sources efficiently, reducing waste and optimizing distribution.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in developed countries, with increasing adoption in emerging economies due to energy demands.

epoch_themes.description: A theme where automation and autonomous systems become pervasive, impacting daily life, industry, and governance.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shifts in employment, privacy concerns, and new ethical considerations regarding machine autonomy.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, regulatory frameworks for autonomous systems, and public discourse on the future of work.

epoch_themes.description: The integration of technology with human biology to enhance cognitive and physical capabilities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for significant enhancements in human capabilities, but also raises profound ethical, privacy, and identity issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased research in neuroscience, bioethics, and the rise of transhumanism discussions.
